name: Ghost In The Machine (itch) (squizout, ChipmunkGames)
description:
Created for LOWREZJAM 2020.

Solve platform puzzles with your mirrored partner trapped in the bowels of the ship. Make your way through the craft, jumping, pushing and racing to the doors to beat each level. Run though the levels while questioning where, why, who?

Controls:

-A and D (or arrows left and right) for movement.

-E to interact with buttons (red light in grey surround).

-Space to jump.

Menu:

-Press E (or click icons when they appear) to select Play, Settings, or Exit when in front of buttons (See gif of menu below).
